name: Chilljong
description:
Chilljong is an endless adventure for lovers of puzzles and unhurried gameplay without limits! An unusual hybrid of genres in the style of mahjong connect will delight fans of the genre. Collect paired crystals and clear the playing field to get to the next level. Set records for passing and check how far you can go!

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Achievements
- Nice soundtrack
